tha-ap29:1.3_0: if she gives up an old family,
tha-ap29:2.3_0: I’m not aware of any bad places
tha-ap29:3.2_0: and was a king of men.
tha-ap29:4.1_0: Attaining the four kinds of textual analysis
tha-ap29:4.2_0: and skeleton without flesh or blood,
tha-ap29:4.3_0: I have realized the six kinds of direct knowledge,
tha-ap29:5.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable Pajjota.
tha-ap29:6.1_0: and the seventh part of the senior monks.
